featured.text: But as the magic fades and daily life __(33)__, it happens that men, forgetting that men and women are supposed to be different, continue to expect women to think and react the way men do; women, __(34)__, expect men to feel and behave the way women do.
Swappers are supposed to make sure their home is in order before they depart, but one person’s idea of “clean” may be more forgiving than another’s.
His flight was supposed to last only 15 minutes, so there was no provision made for him to relieve himself in the capsule.
Isn’t it supposed to be a healthy choice? (F) Linda I liked it fine.

definition.en_def: To assume something to be true for the sake of argument or investigation.
definition.example: I suppose we should leave early to avoid traffic.
